short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to mass unsubscribe from email senders.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of dealing with countless promotional emails and newsletters cluttering your inbox? Email Unsubscribe Tool makes it easy to clean up your inbox with just a few clicks! This Chrome extension allows you to mass unsubscribe from unwanted email senders quickly and effectively, helping you regain control of your email.

Key Features:
•.  Bulk Unsubscribe: Identify and unsubscribe from multiple email senders at once.
•.  Simple and Intuitive: Designed with a user-friendly interface to make email cleanup fast and 
     hassle-free.
•.   Secure Gmail Integration: Uses OAuth to securely connect to your Gmail account, ensuring 
      your data is protected.
•.   Automatic Email Cleanup: Not only can you unsubscribe, but you can also remove all emails 
     from specific senders from your inbox.

No more manually searching for unsubscribe links in each email. Let the Email Unsubscribe Tool simplify your inbox management, helping you stay organized and productive.
